00039 void MetaLogHeader::encode(uint8_t *buf, size_t len) {
00040   uint8_t *p = buf;
00041   size_t prefixlen = strlen(prefix) + 1;
00042 
00043   memcpy(buf, prefix, prefixlen);
00044   p += prefixlen;
00045   encode_i16(&p, version);
00046 
00047   HT_EXPECT((int)len == p - buf, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void MetaLogHeader::decode(const uint8_t *buf, size_t len) {
00051   prefix = (const char *) buf;
00052   size_t prefixlen = strlen(prefix) + 1;
00053 
00054   const uint8_t *p = buf + prefixlen;
00055   size_t remain = len - prefixlen;
00056 
00057   version = decode_i16(&p, &remain);
00058 
00059   HT_EXPECT(remain == 0, Error::FAILED_EXPECTATION);
00060 }
00061 
00062 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const MetaLogHeader &h) {
00063   out << h.prefix <<' '<< ((h.version >> 12) & 0xf) <<'.'
00064       << ((h.version >> 8) & 0xf) <<'.'<< ((h.version >> 4) & 0xf)
00065       <<'.'<< (h.version & 0xf);
00066   return out;
00067 }
